title: Chitosan mitigated the adverse effect of Cd by regulating antioxidant activities, hormones, and organic acids contents in pepper (Capsicum annum L.)
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Melek Ekinci, Mostafakamal Shams, Metin Turan, Sumeyra Ucar, Esra Yaprak, Esra Arslan Yuksel, Murat Aydin, Emre Ilhan, Guleray Agar, Sezai Ercisli, Ertan Yildirim
